name: Arctic Wasteland
description:
Your name is Pen and you traveling through the Arctic region in search of food. You will have to wade through all the trash to finally feast on some tasty fish!

Controls:

Move - Use the "A" and "D" key or the Left and Right arrow on your keyboard to help pen gather the fish!

Pause - Escape Key

Reset - Space Bar

System Requierments:

  • OS: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Status:

I am currently learning game development and I have been following the course created by game developer David Wehle called Game Dev Unlocked. Please leave a comment below and let me know what you think!

Credits:

Thanks to Freesound.com, Joseph Sardin and Stereo Story for providing the sound effects for this game!
